scripts.start: wp-scripts start src/admin src/block-editor src/classic-editor src/theme-plugin-editor --output-path build
scripts.build: npm run clean && wp-scripts build src/admin src/block-editor src/classic-editor src/theme-plugin-editor --output-path build
